contents.item: No, not like this, when I have not seen you without your skin on, when I know nothing, when I am not safe. Not you, whose name all my nightmares know.
Truly Falling In Love With you is not one of the greatest mistake of my Life but Trusting you madly is one of the biggest mistake of my life ever . :(
What is the world coming to, when you can't trust a whore named Snake?
never trust guys with tunics!i did that once............by the way i dont have a tunic.
Trust has no gradient.
contents.owner: Toba Beta, My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

contents.item: Trust All the People All the TimeYou will get Disappointed Every timeTrust No One anymoreYou will get Frustrated even MoreTrust your Wisdom and Follow your HeartThis is where Trusting People should start

Trust isn’t about having a spotless record and finding someone else who does. It’s about finding someone good-hearted enough not to hurt you on purpose, and knowing you’ll recover and carry on when pain inevitably comes.
He comes where He commands us to leave.
contents.owner: Oswald Chambers, My Utmost for His Highest

contents.item: Corporate anthropologist Karen Stephenson argues that though trust is the natural glue of human connection since prehistoric times, it is mostly absent in modern hierarchies—especially in government, where vertical silos compete with and undermine one another, often within the same bureaucracy.
contents.owner: Anne-Marie Slaughter, The Chessboard and the Web: Strategies of Connection in a Networked World

contents.item: Trust was what made everything possible. Trust lent you someone else's eyes, someone else's strong arms or quick brain. Made you bigger than just yourself. Trust was how the club worked. How this whole reckless dream of abolition could work, if people could just come together and hold their nerve. Now ever the Equals - not even their Skill - would be more powerful than that.
Trust is a choice. Actually, trust is more of a desperate, hopeful guess based on limited information.
Without trust, no company can ever hope for excellence.
contents.owner: Frank Sonnenberg, BookSmart: Hundreds of real-world lessons for success and happiness

contents.item: Because trust earned by action is always better than words.
contents.owner: Tim Seeley, Nightwing, Volume 1: Better Than Batman

contents.item: No one, absolutely no one, can be trusted.
If someone lies to you habitually, you can't ever trust them. It erodes relationships.
Trust is the fragrance of your life breathing, if you lose it, your life journey is going to fruitless; you are living just to live as worthless.
It takes a big man to trust a thief," Renny agreed
Trust is like blood pressure. It’s silent, vital to good health, and if abused, it can be deadly.
contents.owner: Frank Sonnenberg, BookSmart: Hundreds of real-world lessons for success and happiness

contents.item: I forgive him, But I don´t know if I trully trust him, and this is funny thing about trust. You can love and forgive, but you don´t necessarily trust, Broken hearts and promises can be fixed so easily because they break in different way than trust, When trust is broken, it´s shattered into thousand pieces. And sometimes, it´s never put back together the same way.
The non-serious and awkward way of approach faces the collapse and loss in one's trust.
